metadata.titleEn: Landsat-derived tree cover dataset of  key node of pan-third pole region (2000-2016)
metadata.titleCn: 泛第三极关键节点区域Landsat拾米级森林覆盖度数据（2000-2016）
metadata.description: The data includes the county-level data of characteristic agriculture distribution in the Qinghai Tibet Plateau, which lays the foundation for the spatial distribution and development of characteristic agriculture in the Qinghai Tibet Plateau. The data are from the development plan of Tibet Plateau characteristic agricultural products base (2015-2020), Qinghai province's 13th five year plan, Sichuan Province's 13th five year plan for agricultural and rural economic development, Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region's 13th five year plan for targeted poverty alleviation of agricultural characteristic industries (2016-2020), Yunnan Province's overall plan for plateau characteristic agricultural modernization（ 2016-2020), implementation opinions on fostering and strengthening characteristic agricultural industries in Gansu Province to boost poverty alleviation, China National Geographic Indication product network (http://www.cgi.gov.cn/home/default/), regional layout planning of characteristic agricultural products (2013-2020). The data is the distribution of county-level characteristic agriculture, realizing the spatialization of county-level characteristic agriculture. The data can be applied to the research on the spatial distribution of characteristic agriculture and the development of characteristic agriculture in the future.
metadata.descriptionCn: Landsat植被连续场(VCF)的森林冠层覆盖度数据包含了高度大于5米的木质植被覆盖百分比，分辨率为30米。这些数据是由ASA/USGS全球土地调查(GLS)收集的Landsat数据汇编而成。该产品来源于Landsat-5主题成像仪(TM)和/或Landsat-7增强型主题成像仪 (ETM+)的七个波段，具体取决于GLS图像。以主要覆盖东南亚和中东的关键节点为研究区域，基于2000至2016年的森林冠层覆盖度数据，利用GEE对数据进行研究区的掩模裁剪，最终得到了34个关键节点区域2000-2016每5年的森林冠层覆盖度数据。
metadata.instructions: The data of special agricultural spatial layout is stored in text format, and the file name is qzgytytype.xlsx. The data includes four worksheets, including highland barley, yak, sheep and wolfberry. Name is the name of the county, ID is the number of each county in the Qinghai Tibet Plateau during the statistics. Type1, type2, type3 and type4 are the characteristic agricultural types of each county.

literatureList.referenceEn: Sexton, J.O., Song, X.-P., Feng, M., Noojipady, P., Anand, A., Huang, C., Kim, D.-H., Collins, K.M., Channan, S., DiMiceli, C., & Townshend, J.R.G. (2013). Global, 30-m resolution continuous fields of tree cover: Landsat-based rescaling of MODIS Vegetation Continuous Fields with lidar-based estimates of error. International Journal of Digital Earth, 6(5), 427-448. doi:10.1080/17538947.2013.786146.

background: Tree cover, defined structurally as the proportional, vertically projected area of vegetation (including leaves, stems, branches, etc.) of woody plants above a given height, affects terrestrial energy and water exchanges, photosynthesis and transpiration, net primary production, and carbon and nutrient fluxes. Tree cover also affects habitat quality and movements of wildlife, residential property value for humans, and numerous other ecosystem services. Importantly for monitoring, reporting, and verification (MRV) efforts to reduce carbon dioxide emissions from deforestation and forest degradation and to foster conservation and sustainable management of forests (REDD), tree cover provides a measurable attribute upon which forest cover may be defined. Further, changes in tree cover over time can be used to monitor and retrieve site-specific histories of forest disturbance, succession, and degradation.
research objective: We produced a global, 30-m resolution tree cover dataset for circa-2000 and 2005 epochs by rescaling the 250-m MODIS VCF Tree Cover dataset using Landsat images and ancillary data. To serve as a baseline of comparison and to help fill the dearth of error assessments of the MODIS VCF, we also performed a parallel accuracy assessment of the MODIS VCF against lidar measurements.
challenges: The spatial and thematic scale of the MODIS VCF and other continuous-field datasets (e.g. Asner et al. 2009) have made reference data difficult to acquire and so quantitative error estimates of these datasets are quite limited. Across all biomes and types of reference data, these independent assessments found that saturation of the optical signal, phenological noise, and confusion with dense herbaceous vegetation led to errors in the MODIS VCF between 10/C131% Root-Mean-Square Error (RMSE), over-estimation in areas of low cover, and under-estimation in areas of high cover.
methods: We developed a global, 30-m resolution dataset of percent tree cover by rescaling the 250-m Moderate-resolution Imaging Spectroradiometer (MODIS) Vegetation Continuous Fields (VCF) Tree Cover layer using circa-2000 and 2005 Landsat images, incorporating the MODIS Cropland Layer to improve accuracy in agricultural areas.
dataset: We produced a global, 30-m resolution tree cover dataset for circa-2000 and 2005 epochs by rescaling the 250-m MODIS VCF Tree Cover dataset using Landsat images and ancillary data.
findings: Resulting Landsat-based estimates maintained consistency with the MODIS VCF in both epochs (RMSE/C308.6% in 2000 and 11.9% in 2005), but showed improved accuracy in agricultural areas and increased discrimination of small forest patches. Against lidar measurements, the Landsat-based estimates exhibited accuracy slightly less than that of the MODIS VCF (RMSE/C3016.8% for MODIS-based vs. 17.4% for Landsat-based estimates), but RMSE of Landsat estimates was 3.3 percentage points lower than that of the MODIS data in an agricultural region. The Landsat data retained the saturation artifact of the MODIS VCF at greater than or equal to 80% tree cover but showed greater potential for removal of errors through calibration to lidar, with post-calibration RMSE of 9.4% compared to 13.5% in MODIS estimates.
backgroundCn: 树冠覆盖率在结构上定义为高于特定高度的木本植物（包括叶子、树干、枝条等）垂直投影面积的比例，影响陆地的能量和水分交换、光合作用和蒸腾作用、净初级生产力以及碳和养分的流动。树冠覆盖率还影响栖息地质量和野生动物的迁徙、居民物业价值以及众多其他生态系统服务。对于监测、报告和核查（MRV）减少因森林砍伐和森林退化而产生的二氧化碳排放，以及促进森林的保护和可持续管理（REDD）而言，树冠覆盖率提供了一个可测量的属性，用于定义森林覆盖率。此外，随着时间的推移，树冠覆盖率的变化可用于监测和获取特定地点的森林干扰、演替和退化的历史记录。
research objectiveCn: 我们为2000年和2005年时期制作了全球30米分辨率的树冠覆盖数据集，通过使用Landsat影像和辅助数据对250米MODIS VCF树冠覆盖数据集进行了重标定。为了作为比较的基准，并帮助填补MODIS VCF缺乏误差评估的空白，我们还对MODIS VCF进行了与激光雷达测量的平行精度评估。
challengesCn: MODIS VCF和其他连续场数据集（例如Asner等，2009）的空间和主题尺度使得参考数据的获取变得困难，因此对这些数据集的定量误差估计相当有限。在所有生物群落和参考数据类型中，这些独立评估发现，光学信号的饱和、物候噪声以及与密集草本植物的混淆导致MODIS VCF的误差在10/C131%根均方根误差（RMSE）之间，在低覆盖区域存在过高估计，而在高覆盖区域则存在低估计。
methodsCn: 我们开发了一个全球30米分辨率的树冠覆盖百分比数据集，通过使用250米的中分辨率成像光谱仪（MODIS）植被连续覆盖（VCF）树冠层，结合2000年和2005年的Landsat影像进行重标定，并结合MODIS农田层以提高农业地区的准确性。
datasetCn: 我们为2000年和2005年时期制作了全球30米分辨率的树冠覆盖数据集，通过使用Landsat影像和辅助数据对250米MODIS VCF树冠覆盖数据集进行了重标定。
findingsCn: 基于Landsat的估计结果在两个时期与MODIS VCF保持了一致性（2000年的RMSE为308.6%，2005年的RMSE为11.9%），但在农业地区的准确性有所提高，并且对小森林斑块的区分能力增强。与激光雷达测量相比，基于Landsat的估计准确性略低于MODIS VCF（MODIS的RMSE为3016.8%，而Landsat的RMSE为17.4%），但在农业区域，Landsat估计的RMSE比MODIS数据低3.3个百分点。Landsat数据在树冠覆盖率大于或等于80%时保留了MODIS VCF的饱和伪影，但通过与激光雷达的校准显示出更大的去除错误的潜力，校准后的RMSE为9.4%，而MODIS估计的RMSE为13.5%。

Verification.QuestionEn: Is a dataset produced by rescaling a MODIS VCF Tree Cover dataset using Landsat images considered a reliable method for improving accuracy in agricultural areas?
Verification.QuestionCn: 将MODIS VCF树冠数据集通过使用Landsat影像进行重标定所产生的数据集，是否被认为是在农业区域提高准确性的可靠方法？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Are the data collection methods for forest canopy coverage mainly based on Landsat imagery, MODIS VCF data, or lidar measurements?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 森林冠层覆盖的数据收集方法主要基于Landsat影像、MODIS VCF数据或激光雷达测量吗？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Which dataset is more suitable for detecting changes in tree cover over time, the MODIS VCF Tree Cover dataset, the rescaled global 30-m tree cover dataset, or another dataset?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 哪个数据集更适合检测树冠随时间的变化，MODIS VCF树冠数据集、重标定的全球30米树冠数据集，还是其他数据集？
Disjunctive.AnswerCn: 重缩放的全球30米树冠覆盖数据集

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What is the spatial resolution of a forest canopy cover dataset derived from Landsat images?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 从Landsat影像衍生的森林冠层覆盖数据集的空间分辨率是多少？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What challenges are associated with acquiring reference data for continuous-field datasets such as the MODIS VCF?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 获取连续场数据集（如MODIS VCF）的参考数据时面临哪些挑战？

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to assess forest canopy cover over time in critical regions?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于评估关键区域森林冠层覆盖随时间变化的数据收集方法的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: A data collection method used to assess forest canopy cover over time involves using Landsat images and ancillary data to rescale the 250-m MODIS VCF Tree Cover dataset, producing a global, 30-m resolution tree cover dataset for circa-2000 and 2005 epochs.
Example.AnswerCn: 一种用于评估森林冠层覆盖变化的数据收集方法涉及使用Landsat影像和辅助数据对250米MODIS VCF树冠覆盖数据集进行重新缩放，从而生成2000年和2005年时期的全球30米分辨率树冠覆盖数据集。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge encountered in creating continuous-field datasets for vegetation monitoring?
Example.QuestionCn: 在创建用于植被监测的连续场数据集时遇到的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a challenge encountered in creating continuous-field datasets is the difficulty in acquiring reference data for the spatial and thematic scale of datasets like the MODIS VCF, leading to quantitative error estimates being quite limited due to saturation of the optical signal, phenological noise, and confusion with dense herbaceous vegetation.
Example.AnswerCn: 在创建连续场数据集时遇到的一个挑战是，获取与MODIS VCF等数据集的空间和主题尺度相匹配的参考数据的困难，这导致定量误差估计相当有限，因为光学信号饱和、物候噪声以及与密集草本植物的混淆。

Example.QuestionEn: Could you give an example of a dataset that has been modified to improve accuracy in agricultural areas?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否举一个已经被修改以提高农业领域准确性的数据库的例子？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a dataset modified to improve accuracy in agricultural areas is the global, 30-m resolution tree cover dataset produced by rescaling the 250-m MODIS VCF Tree Cover dataset using Landsat images and incorporating the MODIS Cropland Layer.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个为了提高农业地区准确性而修改的数据集的例子是全球30米分辨率的树冠数据集，该数据集通过使用Landsat影像对250米的MODIS VCF树冠数据集进行重标定，并结合MODIS农田层而生成。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of tree cover datasets that make them suitable for monitoring forest disturbances?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 树冠覆盖数据集的特征使其适合监测森林扰动，包括：
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: proportional, vertically projected area of vegetation of woody plants above a given height, affects terrestrial energy and water exchanges, photosynthesis and transpiration, net primary production, carbon and nutrient fluxes, measurable attributes for monitoring forest disturbance, succession, degradation
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 高于特定高度的木本植物的植被垂直投影面积比例影响地面能量和水分交换、光合作用和蒸腾作用、净初级生产力、碳和养分流动，是监测森林干扰、演替和退化的可测量属性。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What methods are used to enhance the accuracy of tree cover datasets in agricultural areas?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在农业地区，增强树冠数据集准确性的方法有哪些？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: rescaling the MODIS VCF Tree Cover layer using Landsat images, incorporating the MODIS Cropland Layer
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 使用Landsat影像重新缩放MODIS VCF树冠层，并结合MODIS农田层。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What challenges are associated with acquiring reference data for continuous-field datasets like tree cover datasets?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 获取连续字段数据集（如树冠数据集）的参考数据时面临哪些挑战？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: spatial and thematic scale, saturation of the optical signal, phenological noise, confusion with dense herbaceous vegetation, over-estimation in areas of low cover, under-estimation in areas of high cover
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 空间和主题尺度、光学信号的饱和、物候噪声、与密集草本植被的混淆、低覆盖区域的高估、高覆盖区域的低估

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many epochs were involved in the creation of a global tree cover dataset using Landsat images?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在使用Landsat影像创建全球树冠数据集的过程中涉及了多少个训练周期（epochs）？

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the range of Root-Mean-Square Error (RMSE) reported for assessments of tree cover datasets?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 树冠覆盖数据集评估中报告的均方根误差（RMSE）的范围是什么？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the meaning of 'forest canopy cover data' in the context of remote sensing and forest monitoring?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在遥感和森林监测的背景下，“森林冠层覆盖数据”的意思是指通过遥感技术获取的关于森林冠层覆盖程度的信息。这些数据通常用于评估森林的健康状况、生物多样性、碳储量以及土地利用变化等。
Definition.AnswerEn: Forest canopy cover data refers to the percentage of ground area covered by the vertical projection of tree canopies, which includes vegetation such as leaves, stems, and branches of woody plants above a certain height. It is crucial for understanding energy and water exchanges, photosynthesis, carbon fluxes, and ecosystem services, and serves as a measurable attribute for monitoring forest cover changes over time.
Definition.AnswerCn: 森林冠层覆盖数据是指树冠的垂直投影所覆盖的地面面积百分比，包括一定高度以上的木本植物的叶子、树干和枝条等植被。它对于理解能量和水分交换、光合作用、碳通量和生态系统服务至关重要，并作为监测森林覆盖变化的可测量属性。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How does the method of rescaling the 250-m MODIS VCF Tree Cover dataset using Landsat images compare to the use of lidar measurements for accuracy assessment?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 将250米MODIS VCF树冠数据集通过使用Landsat影像进行重标定的方法与使用激光雷达测量进行准确性评估相比，如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Rescaling the MODIS VCF Tree Cover dataset using Landsat images aims to improve accuracy, especially in agricultural areas, while lidar measurements provide a benchmark for accuracy assessment. The Landsat-based estimates showed improved discrimination of small forest patches and greater potential for error removal through calibration, although the accuracy was slightly less than that of the MODIS VCF when compared to lidar measurements.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 对MODIS VCF树冠数据集进行重标定，旨在提高准确性，特别是在农业地区，同时激光雷达测量提供了准确性评估的基准。基于Landsat的估计显示出对小森林斑块的更好区分能力，并通过校准具有更大的去除误差的潜力，尽管与激光雷达测量相比，其准确性略低于MODIS VCF。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the challenges faced by the MODIS VCF dataset in terms of spatial and thematic scale, and how do these compare to the challenges experienced during the rescaling process using Landsat images?
Comparison.QuestionCn: MODIS VCF 数据集在空间和主题尺度方面面临的挑战是什么？这些挑战与使用 Landsat 图像进行重标定过程中的挑战相比如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The MODIS VCF dataset faces challenges such as saturation of optical signals, phenological noise, and confusion with dense herbaceous vegetation, leading to errors in tree cover estimation. In contrast, the rescaling process using Landsat images maintains consistency with MODIS VCF but addresses these challenges by improving accuracy in agricultural areas and increasing discrimination of small forest patches, though it still retains some saturation artifacts.
Comparison.AnswerCn: MODIS VCF 数据集面临着光信号饱和、物候噪声和与密集草本植物混淆等挑战，导致树冠覆盖估计出现错误。相比之下，使用 Landsat 图像的重标定过程在保持与 MODIS VCF 一致性的同时，解决了这些挑战，提高了农业地区的准确性，并增强了对小森林斑块的区分能力，尽管仍然保留了一些饱和伪影。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How might rescaling a 250-m resolution dataset to a 30-m resolution dataset influence the accuracy and applicability of tree cover data in diverse ecological regions?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 将250米分辨率的数据集重新缩放到30米分辨率的数据集可能会如何影响不同生态区域树冠覆盖数据的准确性和适用性？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Rescaling a 250-m resolution dataset to a 30-m resolution using Landsat images can improve accuracy, particularly in agricultural areas and in distinguishing small forest patches. However, challenges such as saturation of optical signals and phenological noise may still persist, requiring careful calibration to lidar data to further reduce errors.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 将250米分辨率的数据集重采样到30米分辨率，使用Landsat影像可以提高准确性，特别是在农业区域和区分小森林斑块方面。然而，光学信号饱和和物候噪声等挑战仍然存在，需要仔细校准激光雷达数据以进一步减少误差。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What are the potential challenges in acquiring reference data for continuous-field datasets, and how do these challenges affect the error estimation process?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 获取连续场数据集的参考数据可能面临的挑战有哪些，这些挑战如何影响误差估计过程？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Challenges in acquiring reference data for continuous-field datasets include the spatial and thematic scale which makes quantitative error estimates limited. Factors such as saturation of optical signals, phenological noise, and confusion with dense herbaceous vegetation contribute to errors, leading to overestimation in areas of low cover and underestimation in areas of high cover.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 获取连续场数据集的参考数据面临的挑战包括空间和主题尺度，这使得定量误差估计受到限制。光信号饱和、物候噪声以及与密集草本植物的混淆等因素导致错误，从而在低覆盖区域造成高估，而在高覆盖区域造成低估。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How can integrating ancillary data, such as the MODIS Cropland Layer, enhance the accuracy of forest cover datasets, particularly in agricultural regions?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 整合辅助数据，如MODIS农田层，可以提高森林覆盖数据集的准确性，特别是在农业地区。
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Integrating ancillary data like the MODIS Cropland Layer can enhance the accuracy of forest cover datasets by improving discrimination of tree cover in agricultural areas, where traditional methods may overestimate or underestimate coverage. This integration helps refine the dataset's applicability and reduce root-mean-square errors in these regions.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 整合诸如MODIS农田层等辅助数据可以提高森林覆盖数据集的准确性，通过改善农业地区树木覆盖的区分能力，传统方法可能会高估或低估覆盖情况。这种整合有助于细化数据集的适用性，并减少这些地区的均方根误差。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the difficulty in acquiring reference data for continuous-field datasets like MODIS VCF, and how do these challenges affect the accuracy assessment of such datasets?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 哪些因素导致获取连续场数据集（如MODIS VCF）的参考数据变得困难，这些挑战如何影响此类数据集的准确性评估？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The spatial and thematic scale of MODIS VCF and similar datasets make reference data difficult to acquire, limiting quantitative error estimates. Saturation of optical signals, phenological noise, and confusion with dense herbaceous vegetation lead to errors, including over-estimation in areas of low cover and under-estimation in areas of high cover.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: MODIS VCF 和类似数据集的空间和主题尺度使得参考数据的获取变得困难，从而限制了定量误差估计。光学信号的饱和、物候噪声以及与密集草本植物的混淆导致了错误，包括在低覆盖区域的过度估计和在高覆盖区域的低估。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences of rescaling a 250-m resolution dataset to a 30-m resolution for tree cover estimation?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 将250米分辨率的数据集重新缩放到30米分辨率进行树冠覆盖估计的潜在后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Rescaling a 250-m resolution dataset to a 30-m resolution for tree cover estimation can improve accuracy in certain areas, such as agricultural regions, and increase the discrimination of small forest patches. However, it may still retain certain artifacts, such as saturation at high tree cover percentages.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 将250米分辨率的数据集重新缩放到30米分辨率可以在某些区域（如农业地区）提高树冠估计的准确性，并增加对小森林斑块的区分能力。然而，它仍可能保留某些伪影，例如在高树冠覆盖百分比时的饱和现象。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How does the inclusion of ancillary data, such as the MODIS Cropland Layer, impact the accuracy of tree cover datasets?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 辅助数据的纳入，例如MODIS农田层，如何影响树冠数据集的准确性？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The inclusion of ancillary data like the MODIS Cropland Layer can enhance the accuracy of tree cover datasets, particularly in agricultural areas, as it helps to better differentiate between cropland and forested regions.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 包括像MODIS农田层这样的辅助数据可以提高树冠数据集的准确性，特别是在农业地区，因为它有助于更好地区分农田和森林区域。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the primary objective of developing a global, 30-m resolution tree cover dataset using Landsat images?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 开发全球30米分辨率树冠数据集的主要目标是利用Landsat影像。
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary objective is to produce a dataset that serves as a baseline for comparison and to fill the dearth of error assessments of the MODIS VCF by providing more accurate tree cover estimates, especially in agricultural areas, and to improve the discrimination of small forest patches.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目标是生成一个数据集，作为比较的基准，并填补MODIS VCF的错误评估的不足，通过提供更准确的树冠覆盖率估计，特别是在农业地区，并改善对小森林斑块的区分。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to perform a parallel accuracy assessment of the MODIS VCF against lidar measurements?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 对MODIS VCF与激光雷达测量结果进行平行精度评估的重要性是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: It is important to perform this assessment to address the challenges posed by the spatial and thematic scale of the MODIS VCF, which makes reference data difficult to acquire and results in limited quantitative error estimates. This assessment helps identify and correct errors due to saturation of the optical signal, phenological noise, and confusion with dense herbaceous vegetation.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 进行此评估非常重要，以应对MODIS VCF在空间和主题尺度上带来的挑战，这使得参考数据难以获取，并导致定量误差估计有限。此评估有助于识别和纠正由于光信号饱和、物候噪声以及与密集草本植物混淆所导致的错误。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the intended benefit of using the MODIS Cropland Layer in the rescaling of the MODIS VCF Tree Cover dataset with Landsat images?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 使用MODIS农田层在与Landsat影像的MODIS VCF树冠数据集重标定中的预期好处是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The intended benefit of using the MODIS Cropland Layer is to improve the accuracy of the tree cover estimates in agricultural areas, thereby enhancing the overall reliability of the dataset compared to the original MODIS VCF data.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 使用MODIS农田层的预期好处是提高农业地区树冠估计的准确性，从而增强与原始MODIS VCF数据相比数据集的整体可靠性。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedural steps are necessary to rescale a MODIS Vegetation Continuous Fields Tree Cover dataset using Landsat images to achieve a 30-m resolution tree cover dataset?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 将MODIS植被连续覆盖树冠数据集使用Landsat影像进行重缩放，以实现30米分辨率树冠数据集所需的程序步骤如下：
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: To rescale a MODIS Vegetation Continuous Fields Tree Cover dataset using Landsat images, one must first acquire circa-2000 and 2005 Landsat images and ancillary data. The process involves rescaling the 250-m resolution MODIS VCF Tree Cover dataset to a finer 30-m resolution using these images. Incorporating the MODIS Cropland Layer is also crucial to improve accuracy specifically in agricultural areas.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 要使用Landsat影像对MODIS植被连续场树冠数据集进行重标定，首先必须获取2000年和2005年的Landsat影像及辅助数据。该过程涉及将250米分辨率的MODIS VCF树冠数据集重标定为更细的30米分辨率，使用这些影像。结合MODIS农田层也至关重要，以提高农业区域的准确性。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How can errors in tree cover estimates due to saturation of the optical signal and phenological noise be addressed during dataset refinement?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 如何在数据集精炼过程中解决由于光学信号饱和和物候噪声导致的树冠覆盖估计误差？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Errors such as saturation of the optical signal and phenological noise in tree cover estimates can be addressed by calibrating the dataset against lidar measurements. This calibration process helps in removing errors and reducing the Root-Mean-Square Error (RMSE). For example, post-calibration, the RMSE for Landsat data was reduced to 9.4% compared to 13.5% in MODIS estimates.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 光学信号饱和和树冠覆盖估计中的表型噪声等错误可以通过将数据集与激光雷达测量进行校准来解决。这个校准过程有助于消除错误并降低均方根误差（RMSE）。例如，校准后，Landsat数据的RMSE降低到9.4%，而MODIS估计的RMSE为13.5%。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What techniques enable the rescaling of a lower-resolution vegetation dataset to a higher resolution for improved accuracy in forest cover assessment?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些技术可以将低分辨率的植被数据集重新缩放到更高分辨率，以提高森林覆盖评估的准确性？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The rescaling of a lower-resolution vegetation dataset to a higher resolution is enabled by using Landsat images and ancillary data. The process involves rescaling the 250-m MODIS VCF Tree Cover dataset using circa-2000 and 2005 Landsat images, which helps enhance accuracy in agricultural areas and improves discrimination of small forest patches.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 通过使用Landsat影像和辅助数据，可以将低分辨率的植被数据集重新缩放到更高的分辨率。该过程涉及使用2000年和2005年的Landsat影像对250米的MODIS VCF树冠数据集进行重新缩放，这有助于提高农业地区的准确性，并改善小森林斑块的区分能力。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How do technological advancements in satellite imaging support the development of high-resolution tree cover datasets?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 卫星成像技术的进步如何支持高分辨率树冠数据集的发展。
Enablement.AnswerEn: Technological advancements in satellite imaging support the development of high-resolution tree cover datasets by utilizing the Landsat-5 and Landsat-7 sensors, which provide seven bands of data. These advancements allow for the compilation of global land surveys and accurate rescaling of existing datasets to 30-m resolution, thus enabling better monitoring and verification of tree cover changes.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 卫星成像技术的进步支持了高分辨率树冠数据集的发展，利用Landsat-5和Landsat-7传感器提供的七个波段数据。这些进步使得全球土地调查的汇编和现有数据集的准确重缩放到30米分辨率成为可能，从而更好地监测和验证树冠变化。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What methods allow for the reduction of errors in tree cover datasets, especially in regions with dense vegetation?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些方法可以减少树冠数据集中错误的发生，特别是在植被密集的地区？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Errors in tree cover datasets, especially in regions with dense vegetation, can be reduced through calibration with lidar measurements. This method helps address the saturation artifact present in optical signals of high tree cover areas. By calibrating the Landsat-based estimates to lidar data, the post-calibration Root-Mean-Square Error (RMSE) can be improved, reducing inaccuracies in the datasets.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 树冠覆盖数据集中的错误，尤其是在植被密集的地区，可以通过与激光雷达测量进行校准来减少。这种方法有助于解决高树冠覆盖区域光学信号中存在的饱和伪影。通过将基于Landsat的估计值校准到激光雷达数据，后校准的均方根误差（RMSE）可以得到改善，从而减少数据集中的不准确性。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might there be inaccuracies in estimating tree cover percentages using remote sensing data, and what factors could contribute to these errors?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 使用遥感数据估计树冠覆盖百分比时，可能存在不准确的原因，哪些因素可能导致这些错误？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Inaccuracies in estimating tree cover percentages can arise due to the saturation of optical signals, phenological noise, and confusion with dense herbaceous vegetation. These factors can lead to over-estimation in areas of low cover and under-estimation in areas of high cover, as observed with the MODIS VCF datasets.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 在估计树冠覆盖百分比时，可能会由于光学信号的饱和、物候噪声以及与密集草本植物的混淆而产生不准确。这些因素可能导致在低覆盖区域的过度估计和在高覆盖区域的低估，这在MODIS VCF数据集中得到了观察。

Expectation.QuestionEn: In what ways could incorporating ancillary data into remote sensing analyses enhance the accuracy of forest cover estimations?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 将辅助数据纳入遥感分析中可以通过以下几种方式提高森林覆盖估算的准确性：
Expectation.AnswerEn: Incorporating ancillary data, such as the MODIS Cropland Layer, can improve accuracy in agricultural areas by reducing confusion between tree cover and non-forest vegetation. This approach can lead to better discrimination of small forest patches and help refine the overall accuracy of forest cover estimations.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 结合辅助数据，如MODIS农田层，可以通过减少树木覆盖与非森林植被之间的混淆，提高农业地区的准确性。这种方法可以更好地区分小型森林斑块，并有助于提高森林覆盖估算的整体准确性。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What is your opinion on the challenges faced in obtaining reference data for continuous-field datasets in forest cover studies?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 我对在森林覆盖研究中获取连续字段数据集的参考数据所面临的挑战的看法是什么？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The challenges in obtaining reference data for continuous-field datasets in forest cover studies include difficulties in acquiring data at appropriate spatial and thematic scales. The saturation of optical signals, phenological noise, and confusion with dense herbaceous vegetation contribute to errors, making quantitative error estimates quite limited.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 在森林覆盖研究中，获取连续场数据集的参考数据面临的挑战包括在适当的空间和主题尺度上获取数据的困难。光信号的饱和、物候噪声以及与密集草本植物的混淆都会导致错误，使得定量误差估计相当有限。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How would you evaluate the effectiveness of rescaling MODIS VCF data using Landsat images in improving accuracy for tree cover datasets?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 如何评估使用Landsat影像对MODIS VCF数据进行重标定在提高树冠数据集准确性方面的有效性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Rescaling MODIS VCF data using Landsat images has shown effectiveness in improving accuracy for tree cover datasets. Although Landsat-based estimates exhibit slightly less accuracy against lidar measurements than MODIS VCF, they maintain consistency and show improved accuracy in agricultural areas and increased discrimination of small forest patches. Calibration to lidar further reduces errors.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 使用Landsat影像对MODIS VCF数据进行重标定已被证明在提高树冠覆盖数据集的准确性方面有效。尽管基于Landsat的估计与激光雷达测量相比显示出略低的准确性，但它们保持了一致性，并在农业地区表现出更高的准确性，同时对小森林斑块的区分能力增强。对激光雷达的校准进一步减少了误差。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What is your assessment of using a global, 30-m resolution dataset for monitoring forest cover changes over time?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 我对使用全球30米分辨率数据集监测森林覆盖变化的评估是什么？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Using a global, 30-m resolution dataset for monitoring forest cover changes over time is beneficial as it provides a measurable attribute for defining forest cover. It facilitates monitoring site-specific histories of forest disturbance, succession, and degradation while maintaining consistency with existing datasets like MODIS VCF, although calibration may be needed to address saturation artifacts.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 使用全球30米分辨率的数据集监测森林覆盖变化是有益的，因为它提供了一个可测量的属性来定义森林覆盖。这有助于监测特定地点的森林干扰、演替和退化的历史，同时与现有的数据集（如MODIS VCF）保持一致，尽管可能需要进行校准以解决饱和伪影的问题。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how tree cover data can be accurately measured and adjusted using different satellite imagery techniques.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白如何使用不同的卫星影像技术准确测量和调整树冠覆盖数据。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Tree cover data can be accurately measured and adjusted by rescaling lower resolution datasets, like the 250-m MODIS VCF Tree Cover dataset, using higher resolution Landsat images. This method also involves incorporating other layers, such as the MODIS Cropland Layer, to improve accuracy, especially in agricultural areas.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 树冠覆盖数据可以通过对较低分辨率的数据集（如250米的MODIS VCF树冠覆盖数据集）进行重标定，结合更高分辨率的Landsat影像来准确测量和调整。这种方法还涉及整合其他层，如MODIS农田层，以提高准确性，特别是在农业区域。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm unsure about the challenges faced in acquiring reference data for continuous-field datasets.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我对获取连续字段数据集的参考数据所面临的挑战感到不确定。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The challenges in acquiring reference data for continuous-field datasets include the spatial and thematic scale limitations, which make it difficult to obtain quantitative error estimates. Issues such as the saturation of optical signals, phenological noise, and confusion with dense herbaceous vegetation contribute to errors in datasets like the MODIS VCF.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 获取连续场数据集的参考数据面临的挑战包括空间和主题尺度的限制，这使得获得定量误差估计变得困难。光信号饱和、物候噪声以及与密集草本植物的混淆等问题，都会导致像MODIS VCF这样的数据集出现错误。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't figure out how lidar measurements are used to validate and improve the accuracy of tree cover datasets.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法弄清楚激光雷达测量是如何用于验证和提高树冠覆盖数据集的准确性的。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Lidar measurements are used to validate and improve the accuracy of tree cover datasets by providing a benchmark for comparison. For example, Landsat-based estimates maintained consistency with the MODIS VCF but showed greater potential for error removal through calibration to lidar, resulting in a lower post-calibration Root-Mean-Square Error compared to MODIS estimates.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 激光雷达测量用于验证和提高树冠数据集的准确性，通过提供比较基准。例如，基于Landsat的估计与MODIS VCF保持一致，但通过与激光雷达的校准显示出更大的去除误差的潜力，导致校准后的均方根误差低于MODIS估计。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please provide an exploration of challenges encountered in acquiring reference data for continuous-field datasets and the implications for error estimation.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请提供对获取连续场数据集参考数据所遇到的挑战的探讨，以及这些挑战对误差估计的影响。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The spatial and thematic scale of continuous-field datasets like the MODIS VCF has made reference data difficult to acquire, leading to limited quantitative error estimates. Challenges include saturation of the optical signal, phenological noise, and confusion with dense herbaceous vegetation, resulting in errors such as a Root-Mean-Square Error (RMSE) of 10-31%, over-estimation in areas of low cover, and under-estimation in areas of high cover.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 连续场数据集如MODIS VCF的空间和主题尺度使得参考数据的获取变得困难，从而导致定量误差估计有限。挑战包括光信号的饱和、物候噪声以及与密集草本植物的混淆，导致错误如均方根误差（RMSE）为10-31%，在低覆盖区域的过度估计和在高覆盖区域的低估。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please outline the methods used to develop a high-resolution tree cover dataset and how these methods address accuracy in specific regions.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请概述用于开发高分辨率树冠数据集的方法，以及这些方法如何在特定区域提高准确性。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: A global, 30-m resolution tree cover dataset was developed by rescaling the 250-m MODIS Vegetation Continuous Fields (VCF) Tree Cover layer using circa-2000 and 2005 Landsat images. The MODIS Cropland Layer was incorporated to improve accuracy in agricultural areas, resulting in better discrimination of small forest patches and improved accuracy over the MODIS VCF in these regions.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 一个全球30米分辨率的树冠覆盖数据集是通过使用2000年和2005年的Landsat影像对250米MODIS植被连续覆盖（VCF）树冠层进行重标定而开发的。MODIS农田层被纳入以提高农业地区的准确性，从而改善了对小森林斑块的区分，并在这些区域提高了相对于MODIS VCF的准确性。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please discuss potential strategies for improving the accuracy of tree cover estimates in datasets and their applicability in different biomes.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 讨论提高数据集中树冠覆盖估计准确性的潜在策略及其在不同生物群落中的适用性。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Strategies for improving accuracy include calibrating Landsat-based estimates to lidar measurements, which reduced RMSE from 13.5% in MODIS estimates to 9.4% post-calibration. The Landsat data, while retaining saturation artifacts at greater than or equal to 80% tree cover, showed potential for error removal through such calibration, suggesting applicability for diverse biomes, especially in agricultural regions.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 提高准确性的策略包括将基于Landsat的估计校准到激光雷达测量，这使得MODIS估计的均方根误差（RMSE）从13.5%降低到校准后的9.4%。尽管Landsat数据在树冠覆盖率大于或等于80%时仍保留饱和伪影，但通过这种校准显示出去除误差的潜力，表明其在多样生物群落中的适用性，尤其是在农业地区。
